programme.title: High Country
programme.desc: When a killer vanishes into the high-country wilderness, newly arrived Sergeant Andie Whitford must navigate challenging terrain and some hostile locals with the help of Sam Dyson.

programme.title: High Country
programme.desc: Andie's wife, Helen, and daughter, Kirra, forge new friendships amongst the locals, while Andie brings local psychic and suspect, Damien, in as a consultant on investigating two missing people.

programme.title: High Country
programme.desc: After Rose's harrowing ordeal in the bush, Andie investigates another suspect in the disappearances, an ex-army hermit Ghillie Jack.

programme.title: High Country
programme.desc: On the anniversary of a local boy's murder, Sam Dyson pledges to bring his prime suspect, Damien, to justice. Andie warns against any harassment, but Sam can't help himself, forcing Andie to take action.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: The Brady Bunch live in the LA suburbs, a community beset by economic adversity, a crime rate spiralling out of control and the challenges of the information superhighway. In the middle of it all, the Bradys live a chaotically idyllic existence with their kids, where '70s values reign. But problems arise to upset this perfect world. Carol and Mike face a considerable dilemma when confronted with an overdue property tax bill.

programme.title: The Replacement Killers
programme.desc: International superstar Chow Yun-Fat makes his Hollywood debut with Oscar (R) winner Mira Sorvino in THE REPLACEMENT KILLERS, a fierce and explosive action thriller from director Antoine Fuqua. After he betrays Mr Wei, the ruthless crime boss who hired him to avenge his son's death, professional killer John Lee (chow Yun-Fat) goes on the run. Enlisting the aid of beautiful document forger Meg Coburn (Mira Sorvino), Lee attempts to return to his family in China before they are victimised by his betrayal. But Wei's army of "replacement killers" is hot on his trail, and now both he and Meg are targets of their impressive firepower. With both sides fully armed and determined to fight to the death, an ultra-violent shootout breaks out when they finally face off against each other.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A new, technologically superior Soviet nuclear sub, the Red October, is heading for the US coast under the command of Captain Marko Ramius. The American government thinks Ramius is planning to attack. A lone CIA analyst has a different idea: he thinks Ramius is planning to defect, but he has only a few hours to find him and prove it - because the entire Russian naval and air commands are trying to find him, too. The hunt is on.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty McFly, a typical American teenager of the 1980s, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered DeLorean time machine, invented by a slightly mad scientist. During his often hysterical but amazing trip back in time, Marty must make certain his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so that he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Back To The Future II
programme.desc: Marty McFly returns, this time travelling forward to 2015 with wacky Doc Brown to save his kids. Their crazy time-travels have a mind-bending effect on history.

programme.title: Back To The Future III
programme.desc: Marty McFly ends up in the wild west of 1885 to save mad scientist Doc Brown from a crazed gunfighter. It's the final chapter in the time-travelling comedy series.

programme.title: Drop Dead Fred
programme.desc: Every kid has an imaginary friend. Only Elizabeth isnt a kid and Drop Dead Fred is anything but imaginary. With a haircut this bad, he has to be real - and his mischief has Elizabeth in big trouble. When she splits with her husband, Elizabeth turns to her best friend. But it's her mum who sends her back home where she discovers her childhood friend, Fred. Having been locked in a box for 21 years, Fred is bursting with energy to turn Elizabeth's life into a rowdy, rollicking, racy adventure.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
programme.desc: A new kid in town who is picked on by bullies learns karate and eastern philosophy from Mr Miyagi, and learns how to fight back.

programme.title: The Goonies
programme.desc: Following a mystery treasure map into a spectacular underground world, the Goonies fight a developer out to flatten their homes.

programme.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Join the expedition visiting legendary Candy Man Willy Wonka in a splendiferous movie that wondrously brings to the screen the endlessly appetising delights of Roald Dahl's classic book. Coated with flavourful tunes and production design that constantly dazzles the eye, this effervescent musical never fails to enchant young and old. On a whirlwind tour of Willy's incredible, edible realm of chocolate waterfalls, elfish Oompa-Loompas and industrial-sized confections, a boy named Charlie will discover the sweetest secret of all: a generous, loving heart. And you'll rediscover the timeless magic of a delicious family classic.

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: For Jimmy Smith, Jr, life is a daily fight just to keep hope alive. Feeding his dreams in Detroit's vibrant music scene, Jimmy wages an extraordinary personal struggle to find his own voice - and earn a place in a world where rhymes rule, legends are born and every moment, is another chance.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: When Langdon discovers evidence of the resurgence of an ancient secret brotherhood known as the Illuminati, he also faces a deadly threat to the existence of the secret organisation's most despised enemy: the Catholic Church. When he learns that the clock is ticking on an unstoppable Illuminati time bomb, he jets to Rome where he joins forces with beautiful Italian scientist Vittoria Vetra and together they follow a 400-year-old trail of ancient symbols that mark the Vatican's only hope for survival.

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: An epic musical story about Elton John's breakthrough years. The film follows the fantastical journey of transformation from shy piano prodigy Reginald Dwight into international superstar Elton John. This inspirational movie tells the universally relatable story of how a small-town boy became one of the most iconic figures in pop culture.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A doctor plunges into an erotic foray that threatens his marriage, and may ensnare him in a murder mystery, after his wife's admission of sexual longings. The story sweeps from doubt and fear to self-discovery and reconciliation.

programme.desc: A masterful adaptation of John le Carre's bestselling novel that redefined the spy thriller. At the height of the Cold War, a precarious operation goes deadly wrong, and the head of British Intelligence wonders if a double agent is leaking vital secrets. Brought out of retirement to expose the potential mole, master spy George Smiley is the only one who can be trusted to expose one of their own. Or can he? As the emotional and physical tolls mount on the high-ranking suspects, Smiley will be forced into the ultimate international spy game where everyone's motives are in question.

programme.desc: George Jung is the son of Fred, a struggling small business owner. Seeing his family struggle to make ends meet and failing, George vows never to share a similar fate. He then becomes extremely rich by working with Pablo Escabar by importing cocaine into America, but trouble escalates when the FBI are in pursuit.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: It's Halloween, 1991. Near Gloucester, Massachusetts, the six members of the Andrea Gail, a swordfishing boat, head out to sea for their last trip of the season. Unbeknownst to them, a shockingly brutal storm is slowly gaining steam. Before the National Weather Bureau has a chance to inform the crew of the impending danger, it's too late. The resulting battle with three merging weather fronts, an unheralded natural disaster, is gruelling and tragic. Based on the true-life bestselling novel by Sebastian Junger.

programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit's latest enterprise is Anti-Pesto, pest control with a heart. At first Wallace and Gromit seem to have things in hand. But Wallace's mind transference device malfunctions, and he's in danger of being bagged by Quartermaine. Wallace teeters perilously close to disaster and his four-legged pal, Gromit, faces almost insurmountable odds to save the day!

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: In the final chapter of this popular animation franchise, Mike Myers voices Shrek, who is not scaring villagers away like he used to, but now agrees to autograph pitch forks. Longing for the days when he felt like a real ogre, Shrek is duped into signing a pact with the smooth-talking deal-maker, Rumpelstiltskin (Walt Dohrn). Shrek now finds himself in a twisted, alternate version of Far Far Away, where ogres are hunted, Rumpelstiltskin is king and Shrek and Fiona (Cameron Diaz) have never met. Shrek must undo all he's done in the hope of saving his friends, restoring his world and reclaiming his one true love.

programme.desc: Dad-to-be Shrek and his posse embark on a new, trouble-filled adventure, in search of their next king. Another fun family romp.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: In the final chapter of this popular animation franchise, Mike Myers voices Shrek, who is not scaring villagers away like he used to, but now agrees to autograph pitch forks. Longing for the days when he felt like a real ogre, Shrek is duped into signing a pact with the smooth-talking deal-maker, Rumpelstiltskin (Walt Dohrn). Shrek now finds himself in a twisted, alternate version of Far Far Away, where ogres are hunted, Rumpelstiltskin is king and Shrek and Fiona (Cameron Diaz) have never met. Shrek must undo all he's done in the hope of saving his friends, restoring his world and reclaiming his one true love.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: An upper crust rodent lost in London's sewers gets a savvy female rat to save him from Le Frog, a French mercenary.

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: A smooth-talking rooster crash-lands into a farm and attempts to help a group of chickens escape. With teamwork and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt for freedom.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: When teenage Yi encounters a young Yeti on the roof of her apartment building in a modern Chinese city, she and her mischievous friends, Jin and Peng, name him Everest and embark on an epic quest to reunite the magical creature with his family at the highest point on Earth. But the trio of friends will have to stay one-step ahead of Burnish, a wealthy man intent on capturing a Yeti, and zoologist Dr. Zara to help Everest get home.

programme.desc: The woodland friends awaken from their long winter's nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed
programme.desc: The next chapter in this beloved franchise begins as a young girl finds a connection to her mother's legacy as a trick rider and forms a bond with a wild mustang named Spirit.

programme.title: Madagascar

programme.title: The Croods: A New Age
programme.desc: In search of a new home, the Croods encounter the more sophisticated Betterman family. A new threat forces the two families to set aside their differences to avoid extinction.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Thrill-seeking meteorologists are chasing the most destructive tornado in 50 years.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Pulled from the sea with two bullets in his back, Jason Bourne discovers he has the skills of a very dangerous man and no memory of his violent past. Racing to unlock the secret of his own identity, he discovers the deadly truth: he's an elite government agent. To the government, Jason Bourne isn't just their property: he's a malfunctioning $30 million weapon. Lethally trained, built to disappear, he's an agent on the run who has to be taken out. Now, the government's top operative has become its No.1 target.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Former FBI Hostage Rescue Team leader and U.S. war veteran Will Sawyer now assesses security for skyscrapers. On assignment in Hong Kong he finds the tallest, safest building in the world, The Pearl, suddenly ablaze, and he's been framed for it. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building above the fire line.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor 'Sully' Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: On the turbo-charged streets of Los Angeles, every night is a championship race. With nitro-boosted fury, Dominic Toretto rules the road, turning all his challengers into dust. He and his rival, Johnny Tran, are the boldest, the baddest, and the best, but now there's new rage on the road. They know he's tough, they know he's fast, but what they don't know is that he's a speed demon detective with enough drive and determination to come out the winner.

programme.title: Freelance
programme.desc: An ex-special forces operative takes on a private security gig for a journalist as she interviews a ruthless dictator. When a military coup breaks out, the trio must figure out how to survive the jungle, the assassins, and each other.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: Inspired by the legend of Hanuman, an icon embodying strength and courage, Monkey Man stars Patel as Kid, an anonymous young man who ekes out a meager living in an underground fight club where, night after night, wearing a gorilla mask, he is beaten bloody by more popular fighters for cash. After years of suppressed rage, Kid discovers a way to infiltrate the enclave of the city's sinister elite. As his childhood trauma boils over, his mysteriously scarred hands unleash an explosive campaign of retribution to settle the score with the men who took everything from him.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When a teenage rebel is sent to Japan to live with his father, he is hooked on the treacherous world of street racing.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Phillip Noyce directs Angelina Jolie as Evelyn Salt, a CIA officer who swore an oath to duty, honour and country. When she is accused by a defector of being a Russian sleeper spy, Salt goes on the run to clear her name and ultimately prove her loyalty. Using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative, she must elude capture and protect her family or the world's most powerful forces will erase any trace of her existence. With her superiors convinced she's out to assassinate the president, she also must race the clock to learn the identity of the real traitor.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: Cybertron has fallen. When Optimus Prime sends Bumblebee to protect Earth, he begins his journey to become the hero the Universe needs. Crash landing, with no memory of his past, Bumblebee takes refuge in a junkyard disguised as a VW Beetle. Charlie (Hailee Steinfeld), a teenager trying to find her place in the world, discovers and repairs the battle-scarred robot. When the Decepticons forge an alliance with a secret agency led by Agent Burns (John Cena) to hunt down the remaining Autobots, Bumblebee and Charlie team up to protect the world in an action-packed adventure filled with humour and heart that's fun for the whole family.

programme.title: Suicide Squad

Assemble a team of the world's most dangerous, incarcerated supervillains, provide them with the most powerful arsenal at the government's disposal, and send them off on a mission to defeat an enigmatic, insuperable entity. US intelligence officer Amanda Waller has determined only a secretly convened group of disparate, despicable individuals with next to nothing to lose will do. Once they realise they weren't picked to succeed, but chosen for their patent culpability when they inevitably fail, will the Suicide Squad resolve to die trying, or decide it's everyone for themself?

programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment to recover stolen plutonium, Ethan Hunt chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the hands of a deadly network of highly-skilled operatives intent on destroying civilization. Now, with the world at risk, Ethan and his IMF team are forced to become reluctant partners with a hard-hitting CIA agent as they race against time to stop the nuclear fallout. There's never been a threat more destructive, stunts so jaw-dropping in the film critics are calling the best "Mission" yet!

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A deep-sea submersible part of an international undersea observation program has been attacked by a massive creature, previously thought to be extinct, and now lies disabled at the bottom of the deepest trench in the Pacific with its crew trapped inside. With time running out, expert deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is recruited by a visionary Chinese oceanographer, against the wishes of his daughter Suyin, to save the crew and the ocean itself from this unstoppable threat: a pre-historic 75-foot-long shark known as the Megalodon. What no one could have imagined is that, years before, Taylor had encountered this same terrifying creature. Now, teamed with Suyin, he must confront his fears and risk his own life to save everyone trapped below bringing him face to face once more with the greatest and largest predator of all time.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Legends collide as Godzilla and Kong, the two most powerful forces of nature, clash on the big screen in a spectacular battle for the ages. As a squadron embarks on a perilous mission into fantastic uncharted terrain, unearthing clues to the Titans' very origins and mankind's survival, a conspiracy threatens to wipe the creatures, both good and bad, from the face of the earth forever.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: The true account of the disastrous US raid to capture a Somali warlord in 1993. When the mission goes wrong, elite forces must fight their way out.

programme.title: King Kong (2005)
programme.desc: The leading lady in a movie is abducted as a sacrifice for a giant ape in this jaw-dropping, triple Oscar-winning remake of the 1933 classic.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Mickey O'Neil, a bare knuckles gypsy fighter, is roped in to save the necks of two small-time operators whose scheming collides with that of a lunatic kingpin villain, Brick Top, and a missing diamond smuggler.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A deep-sea submersible part of an international undersea observation program has been attacked by a massive creature, previously thought to be extinct, and now lies disabled at the bottom of the deepest trench in the Pacific with its crew trapped inside. With time running out, expert deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is recruited by a visionary Chinese oceanographer, against the wishes of his daughter Suyin, to save the crew and the ocean itself from this unstoppable threat: a pre-historic 75-foot-long shark known as the Megalodon. Now, teamed with Suyin, he must confront his fears and risk his own life to save everyone trapped below bringing him face to face once more with the greatest and largest predator of all time.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: The world's hunger for extreme sports and reality competitions has grown into reality TV bloodlust. Now, the most extreme racing competition has emerged and its contestants are murderous prisoners. The rules of the Death Race are simple: win five events and you're set free. Lose and you're road kill splashed across the Internet.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the government's intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: This story explores the origins of the Batman legend and the Dark Knight's emergence as a force for good in Gotham. In the wake of his parents' murder, disillusioned industrial heir Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice and turn fear against those who prey on the fearful. He returns to Gotham and unveils his alter-ego: Batman, a masked crusader who uses his strength, intellect and an array of high tech deceptions to fight the sinister forces that threaten the city.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Before Blade's mother gave birth to him, she was bitten by a vampire, which made Blade immune to vampires. Now a vampire hunter, Blade, joined by vampire detective Hannibal King and Dracula-descendent Frank Drake, slay vampires.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Before Blade's mother gave birth to him, she was bitten by a vampire, which made Blade immune to vampires. Now a vampire hunter, Blade, joined by vampire detective Hannibal King and Dracula-descendent Frank Drake, slay vampires.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains new-found, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: A young boy learns that he has extraordinary powers and is not of this Earth. As a young man, he journeys to discover where he came from and what he was sent here to do. But the hero in him must emerge if he is to save the world from annihilation and become the symbol of hope for all mankind.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: When the abandoned island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker struggles to juggle his life with his Spider-Man persona as a new foe emerges: the deranged scientist, Otto Octavius.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: This film re-creates the towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th Century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90% of the "Known World." Against massive armies of chariots and elephants, he never lost a battle! Visionary, explorer, and dreamer - he was also a tender son, torn by his mothers burning love and ambition, and desperate for his father's approval. His dream shaped the world we live in today.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: FBI agents sent to Saudi Arabia to nab a mass murderer team up with their Arab counterparts in a do-or-die mission for unlikely allies.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: When an attempt to take down a drug cartel blows up in their faces, two undercover operatives are forced to go on the run together, though neither knows that the other is a federal agent. Suddenly, everyone on both sides of the law wants them dead, and their only hope is to trust each other.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former CIA assassin Jason Bourne resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: A rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Mickey O'Neil, a bare knuckles gypsy fighter, is roped in to save the necks of two small-time operators whose scheming collides with that of a lunatic kingpin villain, Brick Top, and a missing diamond smuggler.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Mickey O'Neil, a bare knuckles gypsy fighter, is roped in to save the necks of two small-time operators whose scheming collides with that of a lunatic kingpin villain, Brick Top, and a missing diamond smuggler.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: With the IMF disbanded, and Ethan out in the cold, the team now faces off against a network of highly skilled special agents, the Syndicate. These highly-trained operatives are hell-bent on creating a new world order through an escalating series of terrorist attacks. Ethan gathers his team and joins forces with disavowed British agent Ilsa Faust, who may or may not be a member of this rogue nation, as the group faces their most impossible mission yet.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: Now that Dom and Letty are married, Brian and Mia have retired from the game, and the rest of the crew have been exonerated, the globetrotting team has found a semblance of a normal life. But when a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime he can't seem to escape, they will face trials that will test them as never before. From the shores of Cuba and the streets of New York City to the icy plains off the arctic Barents Sea, our elite force will criss-cross the globe to stop an anarchist from unleashing chaos on the world's stage, and bring home the man who made them a family.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: It is the year 1250 BC, during the late Bronze Age. Two emerging nations begin to clash after Paris, the Trojan prince, convinces Helen, Queen of Sparta, to leave her husband Menelaus, and sail with him back to Troy. After Menelaus finds out that his wife was taken by the Trojans, he asks his brother Agamemnon to help him get her back. Agamemnon sees this as an opportunity for power. So they set off for Troy with 1000 ships holding 50,000 Greeks. With the help of Achilles, the Greeks are able to fight the never-before-defeated Trojans, but they come to a stop by Hector, Prince of Troy.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Hobbs has been tracking an organisation of lethally skilled drivers, whose mastermind is aided by the love Dom thought was dead, Letty. The only way to stop the criminal mercenaries from stealing a top-secret weapon is to outmatch them at street level, so Hobbs asks for the help of Dom and his elite team.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Phillip Noyce directs Angelina Jolie as Evelyn Salt, a CIA officer who swore an oath to duty, honour and country. When she is accused by a defector of being a Russian sleeper spy, Salt goes on the run to clear her name and ultimately prove her loyalty. Using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative, she must elude capture and protect her family or the world's most powerful forces will erase any trace of her existence. With her superiors convinced she's out to assassinate the president, she also must race the clock to learn the identity of the real traitor.

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: With our time on Earth coming to an end, a team of explorers undertakes the most important mission in human history: travelling beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: When the abandoned island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A talented young getaway driver relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best in the game. When he meets the girl of his dreams, Baby sees a chance to ditch his criminal life and make a clean getaway. But after being coerced into working for a crime boss, he must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: On the turbo-charged streets of Los Angeles, every night is a championship race. With nitro-boosted fury, Dominic Toretto rules the road, turning all his challengers into dust. He and his rival, Johnny Tran, are the boldest, the baddest, and the best, but now there's new rage on the road. They know he's tough, they know he's fast, but what they don't know is that he's a speed demon detective with enough drive and determination to come out the winner.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been years since Batman vanished into the night, turning from hero to fugitive. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar, and the emergence of masked terrorist, Bane.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Based on the Valiant Comics series, Bloodshot, an ex-killer for the mob and slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Based on the Valiant Comics series, Bloodshot, an ex-killer for the mob and slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After a radioactive spider bite, a nerdy teen develops keen senses and amazing strength.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: An event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet.

The epic graphic novel by Frank Miller assaults the screen with the blood, thunder and awe of its ferocious visual style faithfully recreated in an intense film. Retelling the ancient Battle of Thermopylae, it depicts the titanic clash in which King Leonidas and 300 Spartans fought to the death against Xerxes and his massive Persian army.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth. The people of Earth are desperate to escape the planet's crime and poverty, and they critically need the state-of-the-art medical care available on Elysium - but some in Elysium will stop at nothing to enforce anti-immigration laws and preserve their citizens' luxurious lifestyle. The only man with the chance bring equality to these worlds is Max, an ordinary guy in desperate need to get to Elysium. With his life hanging in the balance, he reluctantly takes on a dangerous mission - one that pits him against Elysium's Secretary Delacourt and her hard-line forces - but if he succeeds, he could save not only his own life, but millions of people on Earth as well.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A security repairman stationed on a desolate future Earth rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft. Her arrival will trigger a chain of events that will leave man's fate in his hands.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains new-found, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: The Purge reaches a boiling point as the violence spills over into a never-ending onslaught, and a Hispanic couple flee south to Mexico with the aid of a white rancher family.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Half-human, half-Atlantean Arthur Curry goes on a journey that will not only force him to face who he really is, but to discover if he is worthy of who he was born to be, a king.

programme.title: Wonder Woman (2017)
programme.desc: Before she was Wonder Woman, she was Diana, princess of the Amazons, trained to be an unconquerable warrior. Raised on a sheltered island paradise, when an American pilot crashes on their shores and tells of a massive conflict raging in the outside world, Diana leaves her home, convinced she can stop the threat. Fighting alongside man in a war to end all wars, Diana will discover her full powers and her true destiny.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, The Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold into something beyond real time. Not time travel. Inversion.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: Capitol Policeman John Cale has just been denied his dream job with the Secret Service of protecting President James Sawyer. Not wanting to let down his little girl with the news, he takes her on a tour of the White House, during which the complex is overtaken by a heavily armed paramilitary group. Now, with the nation's government falling into chaos and time running out, it's up to Cale to save the president, his daughter, and the country.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: Capitol Policeman John Cale has just been denied his dream job with the Secret Service of protecting President James Sawyer. Not wanting to let down his little girl with the news, he takes her on a tour of the White House, during which the complex is overtaken by a heavily armed paramilitary group. Now, with the nation's government falling into chaos and time running out, it's up to Cale to save the president, his daughter, and the country.

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic, this action tale sees an ordinary teenager and comic book geek don a green and yellow wetsuit to become the no-nonsense vigilante Kick-Ass.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote island's prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.title: Terminator: Genisys
programme.desc: As he battles to save the human race, a futuristic soldier sends his right-hand man back to the past in order to protect his mother.

programme.title: Wonder Woman (2017)

Raised on a sheltered island paradise, when an American pilot crashes on their shores and tells of a massive conflict raging in the outside world, Diana leaves her home, convinced she can stop the threat. Fighting alongside man in a war to end all wars, Diana will discover her full powers and her true destiny.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the government's intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: Dispatched on a rescue mission to the farthest reaches of space, Captain Kirk, Spock and the crew become separated when they are ambushed with no means of escape.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After a radioactive spider bite, a nerdy teen develops keen senses and amazing strength.

programme.desc: When a teenage rebel is sent to Japan to live with his father, he is hooked on the treacherous world of street racing.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: In the vibrant, sleek 1980s, Wonder Woman will have to muster all her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: A disgraced cop infiltrates the Miami street racing scene with an ex-con to redeem himself by bringing down a drug lord.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: The story revolves around United Nations employee Gerry Lane, who traverses the world in a race against time to stop a pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatening to decimate humanity itself.

programme.title: Wolf Hall
programme.desc: The Act of Supremacy has declared Henry supreme head of the Church of England, but the Holy Roman Emperor and his ambassador, Eustache Chapuys, have refused to recognize either his new title or his marriage to Anne Boleyn. programme.title: Wolf Hall
programme.desc: The Act of Supremacy has declared Henry supreme head of the Church of England, but the Holy Roman Emperor and his ambassador, Eustache Chapuys, have refused to recognize either his new title or his marriage to Anne Boleyn. With Anne pregnant again and away from court, Henry begins to take notice of Jane Seymour. The Seymours enlist Cromwell's help in their dealings with the King.

programme.title: Suits

programme.title: The White Lotus

programme.desc: Jaclyn looks for a different scene. Piper asks for Lochlan's support before sharing a life update. Chelsea finally gets Rick to open up.

programme.desc: As things get wild during the Full Moon festivities, Rick visits an old friend, and Belinda shares her suspicions about a hotel guest.

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: A grieving self-help guru and a recently single florist's lives come crashing together at exactly the wrong time. Does love stand a chance?

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Join Diane Keaton, Bette Midler and Goldie Hawn in this sinfully satisfying revenge romp about a trio of first wives who team up to teach their lying, cheating ex-husbands a lesson. Ivana Trump's galvanising cameo - 'don't get mad, dahlinks, get everytink' - sets the scene in a comedy that hinges on the self-mockery of its ageless stars. Midler's ball-busting shtick, Keaton's ditsy vulnerability and Hawn's eternal youth are just light-hearted grist for the mill of female friendship as a serious source of strength.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark Darcy, Bridget Jones's "happily ever after" hasn't quite gone according to plan. Fortysomething and single again, she decides to focus on her job as top news producer and surround herself with old friends and new. For once, Bridget has everything completely under control. What could possibly go wrong? Then her love life takes a turn and Bridget meets a dashing American named Jack, the suitor who is everything Mr. Darcy is not. In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

programme.title: Here and Now
programme.desc: Vivienne, is an established singer with a successful music career, but after receiving some devastating news ahead of her upcoming world tour, she is forced to reassess her life, the decisions she's made and the relationships she's sacrificed to get there. Still reeling from the shock, she finds herself navigating the busy streets of New York City but feeling more alone than ever before. In the 24 hours that follow she must find a way to make peace with her life choices and the people she left behind including her overbearing mother, Jeanne, her long-time manager, Ben, her ex-husband, Nick and her old friend Tessa before she embarks on the next chapter of her life.

programme.title: Here and Now

programme.title: Made of Honour
programme.desc: Tom is sexy, successful, has great luck with the ladies, and knows he can always rely on Hannah, his delightful best friend and the one constant in his life. It's the perfect set-up, until Hannah goes overseas to Scotland on a six-week business trip and Tom is stunned to realise how empty his life is without her. He resolves that when she gets back, he'll ask Hannah to marry him, but his plans go awry when he learns that she has become engaged to a handsome and wealthy Scotsman. When Hannah asks Tom to be her maid of honour, he reluctantly agrees to fill the role, but only so he can attempt to woo Hannah and stop the wedding before it's too late.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Two Manhattanites plot against each other in a cross-purpose love affair that is meant to be over in 10 days, but might just last a lifetime. In a screwball set-up involving a writer who goes undercover to demonstrate how women routinely put men off by crashing their poker-nights and letting our poodles pee on their pool tables, her sitting duck is a hotshot adman on a bet to demonstrate what men can do to make women fall for them in a matter of 10 days or so.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Ben Finn Finnegan is an affable, modern-day treasure hunter who is obsessed with finding the legendary 18th century Queens Dowry 40 chests of priceless treasure that was lost at sea in 1715. In his quest, Finn has sunk everything he has, including his marriage to Tess Finnegan. Just as Tess has begun to rebuild her life, working aboard a mega-yacht owned by billionaire Nigel Honeycutt, Finn discovers a vital clue to the treasures whereabouts. Much to Tess' consternation, Finn manoeuvres himself aboard Nigel's yacht and, using his roguish charm, convinces the tycoon and his daughter, Gemma, to join him in the pursuit of the Spanish treasure. But they are not the only ones after the prize. Finn's one-time mentor, Moe Fitch, and a ruthless local gangster are intent on beating Finn to the prize. Let the treasure hunt begin.

programme.title: Kate & Leopold
programme.desc: Kate McKay is a modern female executive in New York City whose drive to succeed in the cutthroat corporate world has left little time for romance. When her genius ex-boyfriend discovers a portal to travel through time, and brings back a 19th-century nobleman named Leopold to prove it, a sceptical Kate reluctantly takes responsibility for showing Leopold the 21st century.

programme.title: Monster-In-Law
programme.desc: After years of looking for Mr Right, Charlotte 'Charlie' Cantilini finally finds the man of her dreams only to discover that his mother, Viola, is the woman of her nightmares. A recently-fired national news anchor who is afraid she will lose her son the way she has just lost her career, Viola does everything she can to scare off her son's new fiance by becoming the world's worst mother-in-law. While Viola's long-time assistant Ruby does her best to help Viola execute her crazy schemes, Charlie decides to fight back and the gloves come off as the women battle it out to see just who the alpha-female is.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Korea. Childhood friends Nora and Hae Sung are torn apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Two decades later, they reunite in New York for one fateful week as they confront notions of destiny, love, and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: Far from Heaven
programme.desc: A seductive story about a seemingly perfect family, and the forbidden desires that threaten to tear them apart. Cathy Whitaker has it all - a lovely home, two wonderful children and a handsome husband, who is successfully climbing the corporate ladder. But Cathy's idyllic existence is just an illusion, and she is eventually forced to choose between living a lie or following her heart.

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: Jane Austen's beloved comedy about finding your equal and earning your happy ending is reimagined in this delicious film adaptation.

programme.title: Emma.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice (2005)
programme.desc: Mr Bennet is an English gentleman living in Hertfordshire with his overbearing wife and five daughters; the beautiful Jane, the clever Elizabeth, the bookish Mary, the immature Kitty and the wild Lydia. Unfortunately for the Bennet's, if Mr Bennet dies their house will be inherited by a distant cousin whom they have never met, so the family's future happiness and security is dependent on the daughters making good marriages. Life is uneventful until the arrival in the neighbourhood of the rich gentleman Mr Bingley, who rents a large house so he can spend the summer in the country. Mr Bingley brings with him his two sisters and the dashing but proud Mr Darcy. Love is soon in the air for one of the Bennet sisters, while another may have jumped to a hasty prejudgment. For the Bennet sisters many trials and tribulations stand between them and their happiness, including class, gossip and scandal.

programme.title: Pleasantville
programme.desc: Two modern American teenagers are sucked into their television set and end up living in a black-and-white '50s sitcom.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

programme.title: This Is 40
programme.desc: After years of marriage, Pete and Debbie are approaching a milestone meltdown as they try to balance romance, careers, parents and children in their own hilarious ways.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher gives in to temptation when the handsome teenager next door attempts to seduce her. But trouble ensues when she tries to end the relationship.

programme.title: Mickey Blue Eyes
programme.desc: He walks the wawk. He talks the tawk. Noo Yawk is about to encounter a most unlikely mobster. At the centre of this lively fish-out-of-water comedy romp is a dapper Manhattan art auctioneer named Michael Felgate. Eager to marry Gina, the lovely teacher he's been dating for three months, Michael feels it's time he meet her family. What he meets is the family. Gina's father Frank is a gangster a "juicer" who extracts money for the mob. Now the squeeze is on Michael to use the auction house as a money-laundering scam for dubious artwork, plunging fumbling, bumbling Michael into a world where he must pose as a notorious wise guy called Mickey Blue Eyes. You'll call him hilarious.

programme.title: Life Without Dick
programme.desc: Colleen Gibson, heir to the Rose Red Grapefruit fortune, whose cheating boyfriend Dick is coincidently taken out before singing hitman Daniel has a chance to do the job himself. When Daniel and Colleen meet, sparks fly and Daniel soon discovers that his potential new girlfriend is a much better killer than he is.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: When David sublets his quaint San Francisco apartment, the last thing he expected - or wanted - was a room mate. He had only begun to make a complete mess of the place when a pretty young woman named Elizabeth suddenly shows up, adamantly insisting the apartment is hers. David assumes there's been a giant misunderstanding, until Elizabeth disappears as mysteriously as she appeared. Changing the locks does nothing to deter Elizabeth, who begins to appear and disappear at will.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: Alex bravely fights her way out of the welding gear, off the stripper pole, and onto the dance school floor.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Hitch is a cocky and successful date doctor for the unlucky in love, but when he falls for gossip columnist Sara, he forgets his own rules.

programme.title: Something to Talk About
programme.desc: A contemporary Southern wife and mother has the 'perfect life'. But when she learns that her husband has been unfaithful, she steps back and examines her life from a new perspective.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Julianne is almost 28 and still single, but that's OK because on her 28th birthday, Michael is going to propose, thanks to a safety net pact they made in their youth. But when the phone call finally comes, her best friend has found someone else. With Michael unavailable, Julianne realises that she loves him and must stop his wedding!

programme.title: Vanity Fair
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic novel by William Makepeace Thackeray, growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp resolves to ascend the social ladder and conquer English society by any means possible.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: A resourceful Scottish woman signs up with British Intelligence to find her missing pilot lover. Working undercover as a French housekeeper, she becomes drawn to a mysterious Resistance fighter and pursued by a sinister Nazi collaborator, requiring the plucky patriot to dig deep into her reservoirs of self-sacrifice.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: Harry Sanborn is a perennial playboy with a libido much younger than his years. During what was to have been a romantic weekend with his latest infatuation, Marin, at her mother's Hamptons beach house, Harry develops chest pains. He winds up being nursed by Marin's reluctant mother, Erica Barry, a successful, divorced New York playwright. In the process, Harry develops more heart pangs - the romantic kind - for Erica, an age-appropriate woman who he finds beguiling. However, some habits die hard. When Harry hesitates, his charming thirty-something doctor steps in and starts to pursue Erica. And Harry, who has always had the world on a string, finds his life unravelling.

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival, sisterhoods are rekindled, wild sides are rediscovered, and there's enough dancing, drinking, brawling and romancing to make the Big Easy blush.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Domestic disaster looms for nurse Greg Focker when his straight-laced, ex-CIA father-in-law, Jack Byrnes, asks to meet his parents before the wedding.

programme.title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Rose Morgan, who still lives with her mother, is a professor of Romantic Literature who desperately longs for passion in her life. Gregory Larkin, a mathematics professor, has been burned by passionate relationships and longs for a sexless union based on friendship and respect. They're two people with almost nothing in common, but fate in the form of a personal ad and a meddling sister brings them together. And without physical attraction to complicate matters, Rose and Greg become best friends and soon agree to an unconventional marriage built on intellectual passion instead of sexual heat. But when two people meet, marry, try to remain celibate and then fall in love they realise they are courting chaos.

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: With her glamorous style and sewing machine in tow, a woman returns to her remote home town to set things right, but finds her talent by transforming the women she left behind.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Two Manhattanites plot against each other in a cross-purpose love affair that is meant to be over in 10 days, but might just last a lifetime. In a screwball set-up involving a writer who goes undercover to demonstrate how women routinely put men off by crashing their poker-nights and letting our poodles pee on their pool tables, her sitting duck is a hotshot adman on a bet to demonstrate what men can do to make women fall for them in a matter of 10 days or so.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional societal roles, encouraging them to be more interested in a career than nabbing a good husband.

programme.title: Here and Now
programme.desc: Vivienne, is an established singer with a successful music career, but after receiving some devastating news ahead of her upcoming world tour, she is forced to reassess her life, the decisions she's made and the relationships she's sacrificed to get there. Still reeling from the shock, she finds herself navigating the busy streets of New York City but feeling more alone than ever before. In the 24 hours that follow she must find a way to make peace with her life choices and the people she left behind including her overbearing mother, Jeanne, her long-time manager, Ben, her ex-husband, Nick and her old friend Tessa before she embarks on the next chapter of her life.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Bridget Jones is a busy journalist and singleton lost amid a sea of smug-marrieds in London. After vowing to abandon her many vices, Bridget turns over a new page by channelling her opinions and insecurities in a journal that becomes a hilarious chronicle of her misadventures. Soon, Bridget finds herself stuck in the sights of not one, but two men: her dashing boss Daniel, who thrives on bad behaviour; and the brooding Mark, who she despises but somehow can't get away from.

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: Dodge Connelly, captain of a struggling squad of barroom brawlers, has only one hope to save his team: recruit college superstar Carter Rutherford. But when a feisty reporter starts snooping around, she turns the two teammates into instant rivals and kicks off a wild competition filled with hilarious screwball antics.

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: With her glamorous style and sewing machine in tow, a woman returns to her remote home town to set things right, but finds her talent by transforming the women she left behind.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: An upper crust rodent lost in London's sewers gets a savvy female rat to save him from Le Frog, a French mercenary.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: He's mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: When teenage Yi encounters a young Yeti on the roof of her apartment building in a modern Chinese city, she and her mischievous friends, Jin and Peng, name him Everest and embark on an epic quest to reunite the magical creature with his family at the highest point on Earth. But the trio of friends will have to stay one-step ahead of Burnish, a wealthy man intent on capturing a Yeti, and zoologist Dr. Zara to help Everest get home.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: When Oh, a loveable misfit from another planet, lands on Earth and finds himself on the run from his own people, he forms an unlikely friendship with an adventurous girl named Tip who is on a quest of her own. Through a series of comic adventures with Tip, Oh comes to understand that being different and making mistakes is all part of being human. And while he changes her planet and she changes his world, they discover the true meaning of the word home.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known - and the least successful. But when Metro City is threatened by a new villain, can the world's biggest 'mind' actually save the day?

programme.title: PAW Patrol: Mighty Pups
programme.desc: When their latest scheme goes awry, Mayor Humdinger and his nephew Harold accidentally divert a meteor towards Adventure Bay. The meteor's golden energy grants the PAW Patrol superpowers! The heroic MIGHTY PUPS are on a roll to super-save the day!

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: An upper crust rodent lost in London's sewers gets a savvy female rat to save him from Le Frog, a French mercenary.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train that's headed to the North Pole and Santa Claus's home.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Brooklyn teen Miles Morales is introduced to the limitless possibilities of the Spider-Verse, where more than one can wear the mask.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: As kids in the 1980s, Sam Brenner, Will Cooper, Ludlow Lamonsoff, and Eddie 'The Fire Blaster' Plant saved the world thousands of times - at 25 cents a game in the video arcades. Now, they're going to have to do it for real. When intergalactic aliens discover video feeds of classic arcade games and misinterpret them as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth, using the video games as the models for their assaults, and now, US President Cooper must call on his old-school arcade friends to save the world from being destroyed by PAC-MAN, Donkey Kong, Galaga, Centipede, and Space Invaders. Joining them is Lt Col Violet Van Patten, a specialist supplying the arcaders with unique weapons to fight the aliens.

programme.title: Grand-Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: When Frank Collins (Reno Wilson) suffers from writer's block, he decides to start a day care for his father-in-law (Danny Trejo) and other seniors as a way to make quick cash, while giving him time to still work on his next book. Eventually getting a small group to care for, Frank soon learns that these are not your typical seniors and they can't easily be corralled. With a code enforcement officer challenging the legality of his business, and his senior charges getting into all kinds of trouble, Frank's work days become anything but effortless. Featuring an all-star cast of TV's greatest stars, Grand-Daddy Day Care is a hilarious story for the young, and young at heart.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: After discovering an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new types of dragons, Hiccup and Toothless find themselves at the centre of a battle to prevent a costly war across their land.

programme.title: PAW PATROL: The Mighty Movie
programme.desc: A meteor crash gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into the Mighty Pups. But things take a turn for the worse when Humdinger breaks out of jail to steal their superpowers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Clumsy and overweight panda, Po, dreams of becoming a kung fu master.

programme.desc: Buster Moon is a dapper koala who presides over a once grand theatre that has fallen on hard times. Buster is an eternal optimist, and maybe a bit of a scoundrel, who loves his theatre above all and will do anything to preserve it. Now facing the crumbling of his life's ambition, he has one final chance to restore his fading jewel to its former glory by producing the world's greatest singing competition.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: He's a stuntman, and like everyone in the stunt community, he gets blown up, shot, crashed, thrown through windows and dropped from the highest of heights, all for our entertainment. And now, fresh off an almost career-ending accident, this working-class hero has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life while still doing his day job. What could possibly go right?

programme.desc: When a reluctant bride-to-be's fiance drops dead, she insists on marrying him anyway, vowing to overcome public opinion, the law of the land, and her loved one's objections.

programme.title: High & Low - John Galliano

programme.title: YOLO
programme.desc: China. After an argument with her younger sister, Le Ying moves out on her own. She meets a boxing trainer and starts boxing.

programme.title: Freediver
programme.desc: Alexey Molchanov's daring attempt to set multiple freediving world records in 2023, paying tribute to his late mother while confronting adversity and testing the boundaries of human endurance in this extreme sport.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an effort to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer.

programme.title: Strange Way of Life
programme.desc: After 25 years, Silva rides a horse across the desert to visit his friend Sheriff Jake. They celebrate the meeting, but the next morning Jake tells him the reason for his trip.

programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: After a group of would-be criminals kidnap the 12-year-old ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, all they have to do to collect a $50 million ransom is watch the girl overnight. In an isolated mansion, the captors start to dwindle, one by one, and they discover, to their mounting horror, that they're locked inside with no normal little girl.

programme.title: You'll Never Find Me
programme.desc: An isolated man living at the back of a desolate caravan park is visited by a desperate young woman seeking shelter from a violent storm. As the savage storm worsens, these solitary souls begin to feel threatened, but who should really be afraid?

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny Court-Martial
programme.desc: A naval officer stands trial for mutiny after taking command from a ship captain he feels is acting in an unstable way, putting in danger both the ship and its crew.

programme.title: Midas Man
programme.desc: On Thursday 9 November 1961, a man named Brian descended the stairs to a cellar in Liverpool and changed the world forever.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Bogart: Life Comes in Flashes
programme.desc: Filmmaker Kathryn Ferguson explores the remarkable life and legacy of Hollywood legend and cultural icon Humphrey Bogart, narrated in his own words.

programme.title: Bogart: Life Comes in Flashes
programme.desc: Filmmaker Kathryn Ferguson explores the remarkable life and legacy of Hollywood legend and cultural icon Humphrey Bogart, narrated in his own words.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters.

programme.title: Unsung Hero
programme.desc: David Smallbone moves his family from Downunder to the States, searching for a brighter future after his successful music company collapses. With nothing more than their seven children, suitcases, and their love of music, David and his pregnant wife Helen set out to rebuild their lives. David and Helen begin to realise the musical prowess in their children, who would go on to become two of the most successful acts in Inspirational Music history.

programme.title: Revival69: Concert That Rocked the World
programme.desc: When a festival is launched in 1969 to revive the Kings of Rock 'n' Roll, untold events arise during John Lennon's and The Plastic Ono Band's arrival, triggering his decision to leave the Beatles.

programme.title: The Mountain Within Me
programme.desc: After suffering a spinal cord injury, professional rugby player Ed Jackson's world changes forever. Following Ed's journey on his recovery as he achieves the heights of Snowdonia, the Alps and Himalayas.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: To live in Barbie Land is to be a perfect being in a perfect place. Unless you have a full-on existential crisis. Or you're a Ken.

programme.title: This Time Next Year
programme.desc: Minnie and Quinn are born on the same day, one minute apart. Their lives may begin together, but their worlds couldn't be more different. Years later they find themselves together again. Maybe it's time to take a chance on love.

programme.title: The Fabulous Four
programme.desc: If three's a crowd, four's a party! A group of life-long friends travel to Key West, Florida, to be bridesmaids in the surprise wedding of their best college girlfriend Marilyn. Over the course of one outrageous trip, sisterhoods are rekindled, the past resurfaces, and there are enough sparks, raunch, and romance to change all their lives in unexpected ways.

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: Twenty years after their notorious tabloid romance gripped the nation, a married couple buckles under pressure when an actress arrives to do research for a film about their past.

programme.title: Touch
programme.desc: A romantic and thrilling story that spans several decades and continents, as one man goes on a journey to find his first love who disappeared 50 years ago.

programme.title: AfrAId
programme.desc: The Curtis family tests a new digital assistant, AIA, which learns their behaviours and anticipates needs. But AIA's protective nature means nothing, or no one, will interfere with them.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Two wannabe gangsters hold up a local bank, but when things don't go according to plan, a misunderstanding leads them into business with one of East London's most notorious gangs.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: The world's favourite Bad Boys are back with their iconic mix of edge-of-your seat action and outrageous comedy, but this time with a twist: Miami's finest are now on the run.

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.desc: An exploratory dive into the depths of the ocean of a research team spirals into chaos when a malevolent mining operation threatens their mission and forces them into a high-stakes battle for survival.

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench

programme.title: The Watchers

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: When their car breaks down in an eerie small town, a couple must spend the night in a remote cabin. Panic ensues as they are terrorised by three masked strangers who strike with no mercy.

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: A young woman named Sam finds herself trapped in New York City during the early stages of an invasion by alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: Free-spirited Jamie and her demure friend, Marian, embark on a road trip to Tallahassee for a fresh start, but things go wrong when they meet inept criminals along the way.

programme.title: Expend4bles
programme.desc: Armed with every weapon they can get their hands on and the skills to use them, The Expendables are the world's last line of defense and the team that gets called when all other options are off the table. But new team members with new styles and tactics are going to give "new blood" a new meaning.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: An aspiring actor undergoes a radical medical procedure to transform his appearance. However, his dream face quickly becomes a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Snowbound at their high school reunion, former classmates uncover a murder and scramble to identify the killer among them before they're all iced out for good.

programme.title: The Bikeriders

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire

programme.title: Christmas Eve in Miller's Point
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a family gathers for what may be their last holiday in their ancestral home. As tensions rise, a teen sneaks out with friends to take over the wintry suburb for herself.

programme.title: The Critic

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: A curmudgeonly instructor at a prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit a handful of students with nowhere to go.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: World War II veteran Artie Crawford lives in Northern Ireland. After his wife's death, he decides to set off alone to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near-future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth.

programme.title: Master Gardener
programme.desc: A meticulous horticulturist is devoted to tending the grounds of a beautiful estate and pandering to his employer, the wealthy dowager.

programme.title: The Critic
programme.desc: A powerful London theatre critic becomes entangled in a web of deceit and murder.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga

Sweeping through the Wasteland, they come across the Citadel presided over by The Immortan Joe. While the two tyrants war for dominance, Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

And now, fresh off an almost career-ending accident, this working-class hero has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life while still doing his day job. What could possibly go right?

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Once upon a Christmas Eve, an orphan baby crawled into Santa's bag of gifts and was taken to the North Pole. Raised by Papa Elf, Buddy comes to realise he doesn't fit in with the other elves. Determined to find a place where he belongs, Buddy searches for his real dad in New York City. In the Big Apple, Buddy finds out why his dad is on the naughty list. But most importantly, he sees that the world is seriously lacking in Christmas spirit, which causes Santa all kinds of problems. So with the help of a beautiful department store elf, Buddy tries to teach his dad and the world the true meaning of Christmas spirit and to prove to everyone that Santa really exists.

Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.

programme.desc: A struggling musician escapes to Hawaii on a vacation after he is jilted by his television star girlfriend Sarah for another guy, only to find his ex staying in the same hotel with her new man.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Five best friends from college reunite 10 years later for a wild bachelorette weekend in Miami. Their partying takes a dark turn when they accidentally kill a male stripper.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Life flips over for a small-town pizzeria owner and poet who inherits $40 billion. Sleazy moguls come to whisk him and his money away to corporate America.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: America's funniest family back for seconds! The hilarity begins when professor Sherman Klump finds romance with fellow DNA specialist, Denise Gaines, and discovers a brilliant formula that reverses ageing. But Sherman's thin and obnoxious alter ego, Buddy Love, wants out and a big piece of the action. And when Buddy gets loose, things get seriously nutty. Now, it's up to Mama, Papa, Ernie and Granny Klump to throw their weight around and save the day in this whopping, gut-busting comedy.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Andy Stitzer has gone 40 years without a woman and his pals are out to break his luck. Can he survive their hilariously bad advice? Will he find love and get laid?

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite working stiffs get back to business and wreak havoc in the workplace.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Four bickering couples embark on a journey to a tropical island resort. While one of the couples is there to work on their marriage, the other three set out to enjoy some fun in the sun.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sonny Koufax is a carefree slob trying to save his love life by becoming responsible. He gets the chance when a cute kid turns up needing a father.

programme.title: Mr. Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean can't believe his luck when he wins a camcorder and an all-expense paid holiday to the French Riviera. But during his journey to the south, he falls face first into a series of mishaps.

programme.title: Holmes and Watson
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson join forces to solve a murder at Buckingham Palace. They soon realise that they only have 5760 minutes to solve the case, or the Queen will be next.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male nurse Greg Focker is poised to propose to his girlfriend Pam during a weekend stay at her parents' home. But here's the catch he needs to ask her father first. Alas, the fur flies as Jack Byrnes, Pam's cat-crazy, ex-CIA father takes an immediate dislike to her less-than-truthful beau. Greg's quest for approval gets seriously side-tracked as Murphy's Law takes over and a hilarious string of mishaps turns him into a master of disaster and total pariah in the eyes of the entire family, all except for his shell-shocked girlfriend, who can't believe she still lovers her one-man wrecking crew.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A harried workaholic, Michael Newman (Adam Sandler) doesn't have time for his wife (Kate Beckinsale) and children, not if he's to impress his ungrateful boss and earn a well-deserved promotion. So when he meets Morty (Christopher Walken), a loopy sales clerk, he gets the answer to his prayers: a magical remote that allows him to bypass life's little distractions with increasingly hysterical results. But as Michael gleefully mutes, skips and scans past his family and his friends, the remote gradually takes over his life and begins to program him, in this fast, funny and out-of-control comedy adventure.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After 10 years and two little Fockers, Greg returns and is still battling his father-in-law's suspicions. Will Greg pass Jack's final test and become the family's next patriarch?

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world! After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, the three-time defending champs worry that they've lost their harmony for good. With one chance left at redeeming their legacy, they must they must face off against the toughest competition on the planet: German supergroup Das Sound Machine and fight for their right to win at the World Championships of A Cappella. It will take the power of sisterhood to find their voice and see what it takes to be the world's top pitches!

programme.title: The Little Hours
programme.desc: In this unapologetically raunchy comedy set in the Middle Ages, a group of repressed nuns are tempted by a young and handsome servant who is hired as the convent's new labourer.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: What's a couple of stay-at-home ghosts to do when their beloved home is taken over by trendy yuppies? They call on Beetlejuice, the afterlife's freelance bio-exorcist to scare off the family - and everyone gets more than she, he or it bargains for!

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: While still in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent up until Todd's 18th birthday. Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down on the eve of his wedding when an uninvited Donny suddenly shows up. Trying desperately to reconnect with his son, Donny is now forced to deal with the repercussions of his bad parenting skills.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A fast talking con-artist Rayford Gibson and conservative bank teller Claude Banks are accidently teamed up to become the funniest odd couple east of the Mississippi. In an effort to pay off Ray's debt and restore Claude's reputation, they travel south on a bootlegging run for some quick cash. There is no limit to their comical misfortune as they are placed at the scene of a crime and their mistaken identity lands them right in the front of the judge. The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: "I'm Ron Burgundy, here's what's happening in your world, tonight." Ron Burgundy is a top-rated 1970s San Diego anchorman, who believes women have a place in the newsroom - as long as they stick to covering fashion shows or late-breaking cooking stories. So when Ron is told he'll be working with a bright, young newswoman who's beautiful, ambitious and smart enough to be more than eye candy, it's not just a clash of two TV people with really great hair - it's war.
